abstract: Group of lawyers plan to file lawsuit against Deutsche Bank for allegedly using high-speed trading software to profit in foreign currency markets at expense of customers.
lead_paragraph: The claim to be filed later this year mirrors a class-action lawsuit in New York that accuses the German lender of manipulating currency trades.

headline.main: Deutsche Bank to Face British Lawsuit Over High-Speed Trading
headline.print_headline: Deutsche Bank to Face Suit Over High-Speed Trading

snippet: The claim to be filed later this year mirrors a class-action lawsuit in New York that accuses the German lender of manipulating currency trades.
